Detailed Description

cvmx_rfif_ul_pn_init#

These registers specifiy the initial values used by the pseudo-random sequence generators.

Each of the 8 sequence generators uses 8 LFSRs to produce 8 x 16-bit values at a time. In interation i, LFSR0 produces I(4i), LFSR1 produces Q(4i), LFSR2 produces I(4i+1), ..., LFSR7 produces Q(4i+3).

The initial value for LFSRx in PN generator y is specified by RFIF_UL_PN_INIT(8y+x).

The polynomial used is x(n+31) = x(n) + x(n+3).

Each 16-bit I/Q sample is composed of 16 bits shifted from bit 0 of the LFSR, starting at the most-significant bit of the sample.

i.e., sample i can be determined as I(i)[15:0] = [x(16i),...,x(16i+15)].
